title: First Day/Week at PES?

Usually, following the orientation date there are 5 days of bootstrap. Bootstrap is a week-long period during which on each day you will get to explore each branch by carrying out simple and fun activities (if you are in CS, you will still have to explore other branches). It isn't mandatory to attend but serves as a fun icebreaker to meet batchmates and seniors.

Normal classes will begin after bootstrap. There won't be anything special and you will have normal classes from day 1.
